message.content: {"id": "121323", "title": "Bug 121323: XML Edit Data Set dialog does not persist filter information", "description": "The XML Edit Data Set dialog is not persisting filter information.", "OB": "When editing a data set in XML format, the filter information applied in the XML Edit Data Set dialog is not saved or persisted after closing the dialog.", "EB": "Currently, we cannot use a plain XPath expression (prepended with the path from the data set selector itself) and let filtering be optional for those who need it. This functionality should be added so that users can save and persist filter information in the XML Edit Data Set dialog.", "SR": "Implement a solution that allows users to use a plain XPath expression for filtering in the XML Edit Data Set dialog and ensure that the filtering information is saved and persisted even after closing the dialog."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
